Properties.ProtectedString:
-- Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players")
HoldAnim = Tool:WaitForChild("HoldAnim")
EngineSound = Handle:WaitForChild("Running")
ControlFunction = Tool:WaitForChild("ControlFunction")
Equipped = false
function OnKey(Key, IsDown) Key = Key:lower() pcall(function() ControlFunction:InvokeServer(((IsDown and "KeyDown") or "KeyUp"), Key) end) end
function Equipped(Mouse) local Delay = true local UnequippedConnection UnequippedConnection = Tool.Unequipped:connect(function() Delay = false UnequippedConnection:disconnect() end) wait(0.3) if UnequippedConnection then UnequippedConnection:disconnect() end if not Delay then return end Equipped = true Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") Torso = Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") if not Player or not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 or not Torso then return end
wait()
Mouse.KeyDown:connect(function(Key) OnKey(Key, true) end)
Mouse.KeyUp:connect(function(Key) OnKey(Key, false) end)
HoldAnimTrack = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(HoldAnim) for i, v in pairs({HoldAnimTrack, EngineSound}) do if v then v:Play() end end
end
function Unequipped() Equipped = false for i, v in pairs({HoldAnimTrack, EngineSound}) do if v then v:Stop() end end end
Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped) Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped)

-- Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
EngineSound = Handle:WaitForChild("Running")
Controls = { Forward = false, Backward = false, Left = false, Right = false, Up = false, Down = false }
LastSpace = 0
Part = Instance.new("Part") Part.Material = Enum.Material.Plastic Part.Shape = Enum.PartType.Block Part.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Part.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Part.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom Part.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 0.2) Part.CanCollide = true Part.Locked = true
SmokePart = Part:Clone() SmokePart.Name = "SmokePart" SmokePart.Transparency = 1 ExhaustSmoke = Instance.new("Smoke") ExhaustSmoke.Name = "ExhaustSmoke" ExhaustSmoke.Size = 0.1 ExhaustSmoke.RiseVelocity = 0.01 ExhaustSmoke.Color = BrickColor.new("Bright orange").Color ExhaustSmoke.Enabled = true ExhaustSmoke.Parent = SmokePart
Wheel = Part:Clone() Wheel.CanCollide = false WheelMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") WheelMesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh WheelMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id=179154928" WheelMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=179154958" WheelMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) WheelMesh.Parent = Wheel FrontWheel = Wheel:Clone() FrontWheel.Name = "FrontWheel" BackWheel = Wheel:Clone() BackWheel.Name = "BackWheel"
LightPart = Part:Clone() LightPart.Name = "LightPart" LightPart.Transparency = 1 Light = Instance.new("PointLight") Light.Name = "Light" Light.Brightness = 50 Light.Color = Color3.new(255 / 255, 252 / 255, 153 / 255) Light.Range = 10 Light.Shadows = false Light.Enabled = false Light.Parent = LightPart
Sparkles = Instance.new("Sparkles") Sparkles.SparkleColor = BrickColor.new("Lime green").Color Sparkles.Enabled = false Sparkles.Parent = LightPart
Accelerations = { Acceleration = { Normal = 10, Boost = 30, }, Deceleration = { Normal = 10, Boost = 30 } }
MaxSpeed = { Normal = 70, Boost = 210 }
CurrentMaxSpeed = MaxSpeed.Normal
SpeedBoost = { Active = false, Enabled = true, Duration = 15, ReloadTime = 30 }
Acceleration = Accelerations.Acceleration.Normal Deceleration = Accelerations.Deceleration.Normal
TurnAlpha = 0.30 AlphaDampening = 0.2 CurrentSpeed = 0 TurnSpeed = 0 TurnSpeedAim = 5 ExhaustSmoke = {}
Gravity = 196.20
ActualVelocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0)
Equipped = false
ControlFunction = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ControlFunction") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction")) ControlFunction.Name = "ControlFunction" ControlFunction.Parent = Tool
ControlFunction.OnServerInvoke = (function(Player, Mode, Value) if Mode == "KeyDown" then local Key = Value:lower() local ByteKey = string.byte(Key) local ByteKey = Value:byte() if Key == "w" or ByteKey == 17 then Controls.Forward = true while Controls.Forward and Equipped do CurrentSpeed = math.min(CurrentMaxSpeed, (CurrentSpeed + (Acceleration * (1 / 30)))) wait(1 / 30) end elseif Key == "a" or ByteKey == 20 then Controls.Left = true while Controls.Left and Equipped do TurnSpeed = math.min(5, (TurnSpeed + (TurnAlpha))) wait(1 / 30) end elseif Key == "s" or ByteKey == 18 then Controls.Backward = true while Controls.Backward and Equipped do if CurrentSpeed > 0 then CurrentSpeed = math.max(-20, (CurrentSpeed - (Deceleration * 2.8 * (1 / 30)))) else CurrentSpeed = math.max(-20, (CurrentSpeed - (Deceleration * (1 / 30)))) end wait(1 / 30) end elseif Key == "d" or ByteKey == 19 then Controls.Right = true while Controls.Right and Equipped do TurnSpeed = math.max(-5, (TurnSpeed - (TurnAlpha))) wait(1 / 30) end elseif Key == " " then if (LastSpace == 0 or (tick() - LastSpace) > 1.9) then LastSpace = tick() local BodyForce = Instance.new("BodyForce") BodyForce.force = Vector3.new(0, (((GetTotalMass(Character) * Gravity) * 4) * 4), 0) Debris:AddItem(BodyForce, 0.1) BodyForce.Parent = FakeHandle end elseif Key == "x" then local PartLight = LightPartClone:FindFirstChild("Light") if PartLight then PartLight.Enabled = not PartLight.Enabled end elseif ByteKey == 48 then if SpeedBoost.Enabled and not SpeedBoost.Active then local PartSparkles = LightPartClone:FindFirstChild("Sparkles") SpeedBoost.Enabled = false SpeedBoost.Active = true if PartSparkles then PartSparkles.Enabled = true end Acceleration = Accelerations.Acceleration.Boost Deceleration = Accelerations.Deceleration.Boost CurrentMaxSpeed = MaxSpeed.Boost wait(SpeedBoost.Duration) Acceleration = Accelerations.Acceleration.Normal Deceleration = Accelerations.Deceleration.Normal CurrentMaxSpeed = MaxSpeed.Normal if PartSparkles then PartSparkles.Enabled = false end SpeedBoost.Active = false wait(SpeedBoost.ReloadTime) SpeedBoost.Enabled = true end end elseif Mode == "KeyUp" then local Key = Value:lower() local ByteKey = Value:byte() if Key == "w" or ByteKey == 17 then Controls.Forward = false elseif Key == "a" or ByteKey == 20 then Controls.Left = false elseif Key == "s" or ByteKey == 18 then Controls.Backward = false elseif Key == "d" or ByteKey == 19 then Controls.Right = false end end end)
function RayCast(Position, Direction, MaxDistance, IgnoreList) return game:GetService("Workspace"):FindPartOnRayWithIgnoreList(Ray.new(Position, Direction.unit * (MaxDistance or 999.999)), IgnoreList) end
function GetTotalMass(Parent) local TotalMass = 0 for i, v in pairs(Parent:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("BasePart") then TotalMass = TotalMass + v:GetMass() end GetTotalMass(v) end return TotalMass end
function SetTransparency(Parent, Transparency) for i, v in pairs(Parent:GetChildren()) do if v ~= Tool then if v.Name ~= "HumanoidRootPart" then pcall(function() v.Transparency = Transparency end) end SetTransparency(v, Transparency) end end end
function ThrustUpdater() while Equipped and FakeHandle and FakeHandle.Parent do local Direction = Torso.CFrame.lookVector Direction = Vector3.new(Direction.x, 0, Direction.z).unit ThrustForce.velocity = (Direction * CurrentSpeed) EngineSound.Pitch = (1 + (math.abs(CurrentSpeed / 50) * 1))
local DesiredAngle = (999999999 * (-CurrentSpeed / math.abs(CurrentSpeed))) local MaxVelocity = (CurrentSpeed / 250) if FrontMotor and FrontMotor.Parent then FrontMotor.DesiredAngle = DesiredAngle FrontMotor.MaxVelocity = MaxVelocity end if BackMotor and BackMotor.Parent then BackMotor.DesiredAngle = DesiredAngle BackMotor.MaxVelocity = MaxVelocity end
RotationForce.angularvelocity = Vector3.new(0, TurnSpeed, 0) if math.abs(TurnSpeed) > AlphaDampening then TurnSpeed = (TurnSpeed - (AlphaDampening * (math.abs(TurnSpeed) / TurnSpeed))) else TurnSpeed = 0 end local LeanAmount = (-TurnSpeed * (math.pi / 6) / 4)
if not Controls.Forward or Controls.Backward then CurrentSpeed = (CurrentSpeed * 0.99) end
local XZAngle = math.atan2(Torso.CFrame.lookVector.z, 0, Torso.CFrame.lookVector.x) TurnGyro.cframe = CFrame.Angles((LeanAmount * Direction.x), 0, (LeanAmount * Direction.z)) for i, v in pairs(ExhaustSmoke) do if v and v.Parent then v.Opacity = ((math.min(math.abs(CurrentSpeed), 10) / 10) * 0.25) end end if LastPosition then local NPos = Vector3.new(Torso.CFrame.p.x, 0, Torso.CFrame.p.z) local MySpeed = Vector3.new(FakeHandle.Velocity.X, 0, FakeHandle.Velocity.Z).magnitude local VelocityDifference = math.abs((MySpeed - (ThrustForce.velocity.magnitude))) if MySpeed > 3 and ThrustForce.velocity.magnitude > 3 and VelocityDifference > (0.7 * ThrustForce.velocity.magnitude) then CurrentSpeed = (CurrentSpeed * 0.9) end end LastPosition = Vector3.new(Torso.CFrame.p.x, 0, Torso.CFrame.p.z) wait(1 / 60) end end
function Equipped(Mouse) local Delay = true local UnequippedConnection UnequippedConnection = Tool.Unequipped:connect(function() Delay = false UnequippedConnection:disconnect() end) wait(0.3) if UnequippedConnection then UnequippedConnection:disconnect() end if not Delay then return end Equipped = true Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") Torso = Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") if not Player or not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 or not Torso then return end
Handle.Velocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0)
Torso.Velocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0)
local Hit, EndPosition = RayCast(Torso.Position, Vector3.new(0, -1, 0), (Torso.Size.Y * 2), {Character}) if Hit then Torso.CFrame = Torso.CFrame + Vector3.new(0, ((Torso.Size.Y * 2) + Handle.Size.Y), 0) end
if FakeHandle and FakeHandle.Parent then FakeHandle:Destroy() end
if Character and Character.Parent then SetTransparency(Character, 0.75) end
FakeHandle = Handle:Clone() FakeHandle.Name = "FakeHandle" FakeHandle.Transparency = 0 FakeHandle.Size = Vector3.new(1, 5.125, 6) FakeHandle.Velocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) FakeHandle.RotVelocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) FakeHandle.Mesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=179154910"
Handle.Transparency = 1
FrontWheelClone = FrontWheel:Clone() FrontMotor = Instance.new("Motor6D") FrontMotor.Part0 = FakeHandle FrontMotor.Part1 = FrontWheelClone FrontMotor.C0 = CFrame.new(0, -2.05, -2.365) * CFrame.Angles(0, (math.pi / 2), 0) FrontMotor.C1 = FrontMotor.C1 * CFrame.Angles(0, -(math.pi / 2), 0) FrontMotor.Parent = FakeHandle FrontWheelClone.Parent = FakeHandle
BackWheelClone = BackWheel:Clone() BackMotor = Instance.new("Motor6D") BackMotor.Part0 = FakeHandle BackMotor.Part1 = BackWheelClone BackMotor.C0 = CFrame.new(0, -2.05, 2.4) * CFrame.Angles(0, (math.pi / 2), 0) BackMotor.C1 = BackMotor.C1 * CFrame.Angles(0, -(math.pi / 2), 0) BackMotor.Parent = FakeHandle BackWheelClone.Parent = FakeHandle
LightPartClone = LightPart:Clone() LighSmokeWeld = Instance.new("Weld") LighSmokeWeld.Part0 = FakeHandle LighSmokeWeld.Part1 = LightPartClone LighSmokeWeld.C0 = CFrame.new(0, -1, 1.75) * CFrame.Angles(0, 0, 0) LighSmokeWeld.Parent = LightPartClone LightPartClone.Parent = FakeHandle
SmokePart1 = SmokePart:Clone() SmokePart1.Name = "LeftExhaustPipe" local SmokeWeld1 = Instance.new("Weld") SmokeWeld1.C0 = CFrame.new(0.5, 1.45, -2.75) * CFrame.Angles(0, 0, 0) SmokeWeld1.Part0 = SmokePart1 SmokeWeld1.Part1 = FakeHandle SmokeWeld1.Parent = SmokePart1 SmokePart1.Parent = FakeHandle table.insert(ExhaustSmoke, SmokePart1.ExhaustSmoke)
SmokePart2 = SmokePart:Clone() SmokePart2.Name = "RightExhaustPipe" local SmokeWeld2 = Instance.new("Weld") SmokeWeld2.C0 = CFrame.new(-0.5, 1.45, -2.75) * CFrame.Angles(0, 0, 0) SmokeWeld2.Part0 = SmokePart2 SmokeWeld2.Part1 = FakeHandle SmokeWeld2.Parent = SmokePart2 SmokePart2.Parent = FakeHandle table.insert(ExhaustSmoke, SmokePart2.ExhaustSmoke)
Handle.CFrame = Torso.CFrame Humanoid.PlatformStand = true
RotationForce = Instance.new("BodyAngularVelocity") RotationForce.maxTorque = Vector3.new(0, math.huge, 0) RotationForce.angularvelocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) RotationForce.Parent = Torso
ThrustForce = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") ThrustForce.maxForce = Vector3.new(math.huge, 0, math.huge) ThrustForce.velocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) ThrustForce.P = 100 ThrustForce.Parent = FakeHandle
TurnGyro = Instance.new("BodyGyro") TurnGyro.maxTorque = Vector3.new(5000, 0, 5000) TurnGyro.P = 300 TurnGyro.D = 100 TurnGyro.Parent = Torso
Spawn(function() ThrustUpdater() end)
LastSpace = tick()
Spawn(function() if FakeHandle then TorsoWeld = Instance.new("Weld") TorsoWeld.C0 = CFrame.new(0, -1.365, -0.3) * CFrame.Angles(0, 0, 0) TorsoWeld.Part0 = Torso TorsoWeld.Part1 = FakeHandle TorsoWeld.Parent = FakeHandle FakeHandle.CanCollide = true end end)
Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 0
FakeHandle.Parent = Tool
end
function Unequipped() if Character and Character.Parent then SetTransparency(Character, 0) end Equipped = false CurrentSpeed = 0 TurnSpeed = 0 ExhaustSmoke = {} for i, v in pairs(Controls) do v = false end for i, v in pairs({FakeHandle, RotationForce, TurnGyro, TorsoWeld}) do if v and v.Parent then v:Destroy() end end Handle.Transparency = 0 if Torso then Torso.Velocity = Vector3.new(0, -10, 0) end if Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent then Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 Humanoid.PlatformStand = false end end
Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped) Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped)
